properties.description: Step by Step pipeline for Email Preference Communication Zeta CDP

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT COMM_PREFERNC_EMAIL_ID CommunicationPreferenceEmailID,
CHANNEL Channel,
EMAIL_ADDRESS EmailAddress,
SRC_UPDATE LastUpdated,
CASE WHEN OPTED_IN = '1' THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END OptedIn,
ORGANIZATION Organization,
PURPOSE Purpose,
B_PUBID SourceSystem
FROM [dbo].[GD_COMMUNICTN_PREFERNC_EMAIL] b with(nolock)
WHERE cast(SRC_UPDATE as date) = cast(DATEADD(day,-1, getdate()) as date)
